about_the_game:
SKIBIDI BACKROOMS


This is a co-op horror game for a group of 4 players. Solo mode is also available.



SPEAKER MAN finds himself in an unknown anomaly and is transported to scary and atmospheric rooms - BACKROOMS. Scary and dangerous SKIBIDI TOILETS will be waiting for you here! I don't recommend dealing with them...



Come on! Call your friends so it won't be so scary in these terribly stressful rooms.

What to expect from the game?


  • A minimal interface, realistic graphics and a terrifying atmosphere will provide an unreal immersion into the world of SKIBIDI BACKROOMS
  • Co-op will allow you and your friends to fully enjoy the atmosphere. Try to escape from SKIBIDI TOILETS!
  • Each level hides some kind of danger. Various liminal spaces will break your brain.
  • Early access will allow us to contact you and learn about your experience. Regular updates - adding new locations and mechanics.

name: SKIBIDI BACKROOMS Demo
short_description: SKIBIDI BACKROOMS is a cooperative horror game for a group of 4 players. Solo mode is also available. You have to survive among the BACKROOMS and find a way out before you are overtaken by the SKIBIDI TOILET. Updates and various interesting things await you...
